> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight made a quick and almost imperceptible move and covered her
> signature hoping that that avoid her friend find her an lead them to a trap.

<NEW>

As SABERBACK was distracted with waiting for the transportation device
to open and the SHARKTICONS were curiously watching the technician
work and SABERBACK's agitation, no one paid much attention to
NIGHTLIGHT.

"Got it!" The technician said, relief clearly in his voice.

At the other side of the room a large disk on the floor began to glow
as power was applied.

SABERBACK immediately stood on the disk and looked back at the
SHARKTICONS, "Bring her!" He commanded, and then he vanished from
sight.

The SHARKTICONS started try and push NIGHTLIGHT onto the disk as well.

(TAG)

- Preston
